mapper.insert: insert into public.suppliers (id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{address}, #{city}, #{country}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{url}, #{paymentMethods}, #{typeGoods}, #{discountType}, #{discountAvailable}, #{currentOrder}, #{notes}, #{isActive}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTimestamp}, #{updatedTimestamp})
mapper.update: update public.suppliers set name = #{name}, code = #{code}, address = #{address}, city = #{city}, country = #{country}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, url = #{url}, payment_methods = #{paymentMethods}, type_goods = #{typeGoods}, discount_type = #{discountType}, discount_available = #{discountAvailable}, current_order = #{currentOrder}, notes = #{notes}, is_active = #{isActive}, created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp} where id = #{id}
update public.suppliers set is_active = #{isActive}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers where id = #{id} order by id

select id, name, code, address, city, country, phone, email, url, payment_methods, type_goods, discount_type, discount_available, current_order, notes, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers order by id

select id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from public.suppliers where isActive = #{isActive} order by id
